prompt: Design a professional registration form with a corporate blue background (#003087) and white input fields. Include text fields for full name, email, password, and confirm password, each with sharp rectangular borders and a subtle blue glow on focus. Add a white 'Create Account' button with blue text and a slight shadow. Include a 'Already have an account? Sign In' link in light gray below the button. Use a centered, scrollable layout with professional spacing. The title should use a serif font like 'Roboto Slab' in white, and input fields should have floating labels with a professional aesthetic.
